title: OneDrop - Blood Donation Platform
description: A full-stack MERN app that connects donors and seekers with role-based dashboards, JWT auth, and donor filtering.

title: StoryStack - Blogging Platform
description: A dynamic blogging platform with rich text editing, full-text search, comment system, and category filtering. Firebase Auth & JWT for protected routes.

title: IngiFund - Crowdfunding Platform
description: A simplified crowdfunding web app where users can create, view, and fund campaigns. Uses Firebase for backend and real-time updates.
